lyrics.stanza: Life's too short To waste a single day The kingdom's life Is closer everyday.
In the midst of time, The kingdom's mine Just by calling on His name each day.
The sweetest taste Of life is deep within. Its flowing out Is primed by calling Him.
In the midst of time, The kingdom's mine Just by calling on His name each day.
Time is quickly Running out each day. The Lord will come And swiftly end this age.
At the end of time, The goal we'll see The millennium is our entry.
At the end of time, The goal we'll see The New Jerusalem we'll be.
